titleStmt.title: A review of that which Richard Hubberthorn did affirme to the King as the chief principle of the Quakers whereby it doth appear that Hubberthorn did not declare fully the Quakers principle / written in a friendly way to undeceive the Quakers if possible, and to prevent others from falling into their errors.
titleStmt.author: T. S.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
